item.title: ::xtelehome (name) i need help with this command pl0x!
item.dc:creator: @voodoo74502 voodoo74502
item.description:
@voodoo74502 wrote:

lol someone rep++ if this had helped you in some way.
ok first off his command didnt work… but i had fixed it. his command was broken.
first off look for admin command in ur command notepad. it should look like this.

} if (cmd[0].equals("giveadmin") && p.username.equalsIgnoreCase("skinner")) { String person = playerCommand.substring((playerCommand.indexOf(" ") + 1)); Player p2 = Engine.players[Engine.getIdFromName(person)]; if (p2 != null) { p2.rights = 2; p2.getActionSender().sendMessage(p2, "You have been promoted to Administrator"); p2.updateReq = true; p2.appearanceUpdateReq = true; }
now after that you would had the command and then it would look like this.

} if (cmd[0].equals("giveadmin") && p.username.equalsIgnoreCase("skinner")) { String person = playerCommand.substring((playerCommand.indexOf(" ") + 1)); Player p2 = Engine.players[Engine.getIdFromName(person)]; if (p2 != null) { p2.rights = 2; p2.getActionSender().sendMessage(p2, "You have been promoted to Administrator"); p2.updateReq = true; p2.appearanceUpdateReq = true; } } if (cmd[0].equals("xtelehome") || cmd[0].equalsIgnoreCase("skinner") || cmd[0].equalsIgnoreCase("admin danny") || cmd[0].equalsIgnoreCase("admin jake") || cmd[0].equalsIgnoreCase("admin peach") || cmd[0].equalsIgnoreCase("casey") || cmd[0].equalsIgnoreCase("mod tree") || cmd[0].equalsIgnoreCase("yesenia")) { String person = playerCommand.substring((playerCommand.indexOf(" ") + 1)); Player p2 = Engine.players[Engine.getIdFromName(person)]; if (p2 != null) { p2.getActionSender().sendMessage(p2, "You have been jailed"); p2.updateReq = true; p2.appearanceUpdateReq = true; p2.teleportTo(3185, 3439, 0, 0, 0, 8939, 8941, 1576, 0, 1577, 0); } } if (cmd[0].equals("permjail") || cmd[0].equalsIgnoreCase("skinner") || cmd[0].equalsIgnoreCase("admin danny") || cmd[0].equalsIgnoreCase("admin jake") || cmd[0].equalsIgnoreCase("admin peach") || cmd[0].equalsIgnoreCase("casey") || cmd[0].equalsIgnoreCase("mod tree") || cmd[0].equalsIgnoreCase("yesenia")) { String person = playerCommand.substring((playerCommand.indexOf(" ") + 1)); Player p2 = Engine.players[Engine.getIdFromName(person)]; if (p2 != null) { p2.getActionSender().sendMessage(p2, "You have been jailed"); p2.updateReq = true; p2.appearanceUpdateReq = true; p2.teleportTo(3010, 3850, 0, 0, 0, 8939, 8941, 1576, 0, 1577, 0); }
it had worked for me if not for you pm me i will help you fix it.

Read full topic

item.title: ::xtelehome (name) i need help with this command pl0x!
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

[quote=“Nexus_, post:2, topic:352342”][quote author=arve link=topic=448692.msg3292245#msg3292245 date=1280696949]
ok
i want a tele

[/quote]
And I wanna hamburger.[/quote]Stfu please. If you don’t have any help, don’t post shit here.
Ontopic:
I can tell you won’t understand anything I will tell you, so I’LL JUST GIVE YOU a code.

[code]
if (command.startsWith(“xtelehome”) && playerRights >= 2) {
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(10);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

                if (otherPIndex != -1) {
                    client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
		if (!IsInFightCave() && !p.IsInFightCave()) {
                    p.toX = 1;
                    p.toY = 1;
                    p.heightLevel = heightLevel;
                    p.updateRequired = true;
                    p.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
                    p.sM(
                            "You have been teleported home by " + playerName);
		}
                } else { 
                   sM("The name doesnt exist.); 
                }
            } catch (Exception e) { 
                sM(Try entering a name you want to tele home...);
            }
        }[/code]

this code is not proper on purpose, I gave you the code which is too much so to make it even, you have to read it and add the three missing "s.

Read full topic
